title: Create a Brand Guidelines Document
description: A brand manager needs to create a comprehensive document outlining the brand's visual identity.

tasks.description: Gather all core brand assets: logo files, color palette (hex codes), and font families.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all the necessary brand assets.

tasks.description: Create a document that specifies rules for logo usage (e.g., clear space, minimum size).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly defines how the logo should and should not be used.

tasks.description: Add sections for the primary and secondary color palettes and typography rules (e.g., font sizes for headlines vs. body text).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a complete visual style guide.
